name: kill the covid-x
description:
A new virus is scaring the world.

Save the earth, protect the survivors and stop the virus!

In "kill the covid-x" you have to help us save the Earth, crossing the different corners of the planet that have fallen prey to a devastating virus, where you must descend to the depths of hell, survive the hordes of vampire bats, mutant dogs, devastating viruses like the covid-x (corona virus), participating in the fiercest battle in history.

The nightmare is not over!
We need you!.

"Kill the Covid-X" is a third-person science fiction action game with shooting elements.
